description:
The United States Tennis Association is pleased to offer the official iPhone app for the 2014 US Open Tennis Championships, developed by IBM with special features from American Express and LG.  Follow the action LIVE during the Open, August 25 to September 8, 2014.

Key Features:
Scores – Smarter Analytics by IBM
LIVE exclusive point-by-point scoring, statistics and completed match results during the US Open.

Video
LIVE streaming video during Labor Day and Finals Weekends, and on-demand video highlights, press conferences, analysis and more throughout the tournament.

US Open Live Predictive Challenge presented by LG G3
This predictive challenge game is a first of its kind for tennis. During each match, fans can predict match action and test their skills against others. A great way to participate from your seats at the match or when watching from home or on the go! Don't miss your chance to win great prizes from LG including a LG G3 phone, 55" Class LG Smart TV and others. 

News
Latest news updates from on and off the court throughout the tournament.

US Open Radio - American Express Special Feature
LIVE streaming ball-by-ball radio coverage featuring our US Open RadioQ&A — a live, interactive Q&A with match commentators featuring user-submitted questions via Twitter.

Schedule of Play – presented by Citizen 
Keep track of when and where all the matches are throughout the day.

Draws presented by Mercedes-Benz
The easy to navigate draw allows you to follow your favorite players, results and of all the great match-ups.

Push Alerts
Get breaking news and player updates as the action happens.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

NOTE: When you are on the grounds of the USTA Billie Jean King National Tennis Center, be sure to use the " USOpen2014" free WiFi Network courtesy of Time Warner Cable.
releaseNotes:
- Updated design for 2014
- Redesigned TrendCast feature
- New Predictive Game feature
- Rich Media Inbox
